title: Bohr - electron wavelength in 2nd hydrogen orbit

content.question: In the Bohr model of the hydrogen atom, the second-smallest electron orbit has a radius of <math alttext="0.21 nanometers" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>0.21</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>nm</mtext></math>. What is the de Broglie wavelength of an electron in this orbit?
